items.title: Integrating Human Data in Virtual Environments
items.description:
Brainware + New Media XR

An exploration of experimental generative art works that integrates EEG with extended reality.
items.ogDescription:
Brainware + New Media XR

An exploration of experimental generative art works that integrates EEG with extended reality.

items.title: Moment
items.description:
New Media Public Sculpture

Awarded Installation for 2023 Rail Trail Lights presented by US Bank in Charlotte NC.

Building on the influence of a historical internet diagram, coupling AI with iterative design inputs that seek to provide a moment of clarity and reflection in an urban setting.
items.ogDescription: the influence of a historical internet diagram, coupling AI with iterative design inputs that seek to provide a moment of clarity and reflection in an urban setting.
items.ogAlt: Large glowing computer tower, with sunset clouds behind it.

items.title: Generative Fossils
items.description:
A new series using generative models to create historical artifacts of imaginary creatures from virtual worlds.

A few lines of code, become vector points, xy plotter drawings, 3D prints, and augmented reality creatures. These each act as a container for the previous to dissolve the veil of reality.
items.ogAlt: Crystal structure with fractured outcrop of 3d model.

items.title: New Media Generative Works
items.description: A collection of new media generative works that explore storytelling through the computational display of visual data and sound.
items.ogAlt: Crystal structure with fractured outcrop of 3d model.
